post.title: Going Serverless
post.content: Well this project has escalated quickly. What started as just a quick NextJS blog project turned into exploring more AWS. Utilized the Serverless Component CLI to deploy this at edge on lambda and Cloudfront. Really happy with the results now I just need to automate the deployments on github actions and I will have a fully featured stack. Anyway short post, going to actually relax a bit this weekend now. Stay tuned for more and remember source code is available on github.
